main.p: This Product Listing Policy explains the rules for listing products on Trademeda.com. Please review it carefully before registering your products on our site.
1. You must not list, sell, or purchase any items on Trademeda.com that are banned or restricted by any federal, state, or local law in any country.
2. The platform prohibits the trade of illegal products, items that infringe on intellectual property rights, or those that could easily be used for illegal purposes.

3. As a user of Trademeda, it is your responsibility to ensure the legality and permissibility of your listed products. Before adding any product, selling lead, or buying lead, you must confirm that your items comply with this policy. Trademeda has the right to remove any listings that violate these terms without prior notice and may disable accounts of users who repeatedly breach the policy after receiving warnings.
This section details items that are strictly forbidden on Trademeda.com:

ul.li: The platform prohibits the sale of alcoholic beverages, including beer, wine, whisky, gin, vodka, and rum.
There is complete prohibition on sale of cigars, cigarettes, pipe tobacco, hookah tobacco, and chewing tobacco.
While electronic cigarettes and accessories are permitted, nicotine and other e-liquids are banned.
Prescription medications, psychotropic drugs, and narcotics are not permitted.
Sexual enhancement foods and supplementstaken orally are banned.
The sale of unapproved drugs and medical devices is not allowed.
The platform strictly bans the sale of narcotics, tranquilizers, psychotropic substances, both natural and synthetic drugs, steroids, and other controlled substances.
Selling chemicals used in the production of drugs is also prohibited.
The trade of gold, silver, and other precious metals (excluding jewelry) is banned.
Rough diamonds and "conflict minerals" from countries that do not comply with international regulations are forbidden.
Products derived from wildlife, including pelts, skins, organs, teeth, claws, shells, bones, tusks, ivory, and similar items, are prohibited.
Services such as money transfers, bank guarantees, letters of credit, loans, fundraising, and personal investment services are not allowed.
Counterfeit currency and stamps
Adult subscription or chatting services, contracts, and tickets are banned.
Pornographic, erotic, and adult content, including pictures, videos, DVDs, magazines, toys, etc., is prohibited.
Credit card services, credit repair services, applications for financial services or loans, and collection services are not allowed.
The sale of mailing lists and personal information is not allowed.
Items promoting hatred, racism, religious persecution, or products featuring nudity are not allowed
Weapons such as firearms, ammunition, high-capacity magazines, stun guns, air guns, and military weapons are prohibited.
Human body parts, fluids, and remains are not permitted.
Job postings, lottery, raffle, and contest-related items are banned..
Requests for donations are banned.
Items that are Sanctioned and prohibited by regulations and authorities are not allowed.
Unauthorized software, OEM or bundled software, spyware, spamware, e-mail advertising, opt-in, or any commercial messaging services are banned.
Trademeda prohibits users from countries listed on US and international sanctions lists. Accounts from these regions will be deleted without prior notice.

main.p: By listing products on Trademeda.com, you agree to abide by this Product Listing Policy. Failure to comply may result in the removal of your listings and the suspension or termination of your account.
